title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
short_cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Rani Mukerji, Farida Jalal, Reema Lagoo, Salman Khan, Archana Puran Singh, Himani Shivpuri, Johny Lever, Anupam Kher, Sana Saeed

desc: Per her mother’s last wish, a girl sets out to reunite her father with the college best friend who loved him – only to discover the woman is engaged.
